ProfessionalSummary:
Creative Design professional with the ability to translate concepts into well designed documents
by integrating various elements, including illustration, formatting, photography and typography.
Flexible and versatile from working independently to working in a team environment. Creation of
graphic designs for marketing communication materials, logos and brochures using design
elements that articulate key ideas and messages. Ability to follow through with projects from
conception to completion.

Name.Raw: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Advertising Art/Graphic Design

EducationDetails.Text:
Bachelor of Fine Arts in Advertising Art/Graphic Design
University of North Texas, Denton, Texas

Name.Raw: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Advertising Art/Graphic Design

ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~   is experienced in:  User Experience (Web Design; Graphic Design); and Marketing (Consumer).    ~~~~~~~~   has 17 years of work experience.

Positions.Description:
Graphic design projects for clients such as PepsiCo, Frito-Lay, TXU Energy, Prudential,
Quaker, Tootsie Roll, and other companies. New logo and illustration design for employee
recognition awards, client awards, clothing, and consumer goods. Designed PowerPoint decks
and presentations. Designed and created mock-ups for client presentations. Photography of consumer product goods. Product image and logo adjustments for presentations and service
award sites.

Graphic Design Projects - Bedford, TX

Projects providing graphic design of corporate brochures and marketing materials. Proof
reading and editing of brochures, proposals and marketing materials. Ensured that artwork
complied with creative specifications for text, color and design. Graphic design and photo
editing of print advertising. Designed logo and packaging for start-up beverage manufacturer.
Organized and archived image and template libraries. Edited and modified insurance
disclosures, applications and documents in InDesign and uploaded into SharePoint server.

Creation of new Ampad branding and packaging. Logos, images and product development for Walmart, Staples and other suppliers of Ampad products. Creation of customer sell
sheets, brochures, ads, patterns, greeting cards, note cards and packaging to promote
Ampad's newest office products. Organized and archived image library. Transmitting of creative files via ftp sites and email. Mock-ups of new product lines for sales presentations.
Created concepts, rough layouts and designs for review.

Mid-States Services - Fort Worth, TX
Graphics and Publications Consultant, March 2005
Redesigned corporate brochure for national commissary supply company. Designed a
company flyer for client distribution. Modified images and photos of vendor supplied art files for company website.

Designed 4-color spec ads to be used by the Verizon Superpages sales force.
Collaboration with Sales Reps to produce ads for clients and business owners. Creation of
ads using customer supplied artwork and accessing customer websites for information and graphics. Cross trained on new Verizon Visi program and MultiAd Creator software.

Designed 4-color spec ads to be used by the Verizon Superpages sales force.
Collaboration with Sales Reps to produce ads for clients and business owners. Creation of
ads using customer supplied artwork and accessing customer websites for information and
graphics. Modified customer supplied logos and graphics to fit multiple sized ads for Verizon Business Directories.

Created pharmaceutical product labels for medical diagnostic equipment and products.
Creation and archiving of art templates. Proof reading of all created artwork and documents. Collaboration with international departments to finalize labels for foreign
markets. Crossed trained on Engineering Product Data Management (EPDM) system to perform data entry and proofing of documents.

Created page layouts with customer provided copy and photos for real estate magazines
for the US market. Modified images and photos of vendor supplied art files. Proof read and edited page layouts for marketing department.

Achievements: recognition awards, client awards, clothing, and consumer goods. Designed PowerPoint decks
